description: Lee Ryder pulls into a gas station and asks for directions.  While his car is being filled with gas he goes into the restroom.  Soon the gas station employee comes in sees him pulling on his dick in the bathroom stall.  He decides to join him in the stall without any complaints.  While cocksucking is going on it the stall, a stranger comes into the bathroom and notices two sets of legs in one stall.  He soon joins in for a three way in the bathroom stall.  All of this for only ten dollars worth of gas.
title: Huge #1
